faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Need Help? We Have Got Answers.
faq.description: If you have anything else you want to ask,

questions.title: What is BitNova?
questions.text: BitNova is a next-generation trading platform that allows you to trade cryptocurrencies, stocks, and digital assets in one secure and powerful dashboard. Whether you’re a beginner or a pro, BitNova gives you the tools to trade smarter.

questions.title: How secure is my money on BitNova?
questions.text: Your security is our top priority. BitNova uses bank-level encryption, two-factor authentication, and cold wallet storage for digital assets to ensure your funds and personal data remain completely safe.

questions.title: How can I start trading on BitNova?
questions.text: Simply create an account, verify your identity, and deposit funds using your preferred payment method. Once your account is set up, you can start trading instantly with real-time data and AI-driven insights.

questions.title: Does BitNova support cryptocurrency trading?
questions.text: Yes. BitNova supports a wide range of popular cryptocurrencies including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana, and more — all with real-time market analytics and secure wallet integration.

questions.title: Is BitNova available on mobile devices?
questions.text: Absolutely. BitNova is fully optimized for both iOS and Android devices, so you can trade anywhere, anytime through our intuitive mobile app.

questions.title: How do withdrawals work on BitNova?
questions.text: Withdrawals are fast and simple. Once your withdrawal request is verified, funds are sent to your linked bank or crypto wallet, typically within 24 hours depending on network conditions.

questions.title: Are there any fees for trading on BitNova?
questions.text: BitNova offers low, transparent trading fees with no hidden charges. You can view all fees clearly on the trading dashboard before making any transactions.

questions.title: Can beginners use BitNova?
questions.text: Definitely! BitNova is designed for all experience levels. Our guided tutorials, demo mode, and simplified UI make it easy for beginners to learn trading safely while gaining confidence.

questions.title: Is BitNova a regulated platform?
questions.text: Yes. BitNova complies with international KYC and AML regulations to ensure transparent, legal, and secure trading for all our users worldwide.

questions.title: How can I contact BitNova support?
questions.text: You can reach our 24/7 customer support team directly through live chat in the app or by emailing support@bitnova.io. Our experts are always ready to help you with any questions.
